name: Party at Novosadski Kej
description: Come hang out and link up with other people.

name: Novi Sad Galleries
description: Explore galleries on top of the Petrovaridn Fort and find the picture from the image.

name: See the city from a different perspective
description: Feeling adventurous today? Hop on a bus ride and see where it takes you.

name: City centre get together
description: Come see the lively city centre and connect with new people.

name: Chill in the forest
description: Go for a nice relaxing walk, stop by for some hot coffee in Gorski Smesko and enjoy your day.
miscEncounterTask: Pet all the cats and dogs wandering around.
